title: Create Contact Us Page
description: Develop the public-facing contact us page with contact form and company information

user_stories: As a potential customer, I want to contact the company so that I can get more information
As a user, I want to find company contact information so that I can reach out when needed
business_rules: Contact us page must display company information
Contact us page must provide a functional contact form
Contact us page must follow the design system
Contact us page must work for anonymous users
edge_cases: Handling contact form success and error states

acceptance_criteria: Contact us page displays company information
Contact us page provides functional contact form
Contact us page follows the design system
Contact us page handles form validation and submission
Contact us page works for anonymous users

integration_tests: Contact form integration with backend API

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement contact us page following React best practices. Use React Hook Form for form handling. Display company information and provide contact form functionality.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper input validation for contact form. Implement CAPTCHA or similar for bot protection.
